alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 19 at 7:57AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A COLD FRONT WILL BRING A LINE OF HEAVY SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS ACROSS KAUAI COUNTY THIS MORNING THROUGH 930 AM HST... At 753 AM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 34 miles northwest of Polihale to 65 miles west of Mana. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... all of Kauai and Niihau. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest; Niihau
